item0.name: Cull
item0.description:
7 Attack Damage
  • Attacks restore 3 Health per hit.
  • Reap: Killing a lane minion grants 1 additional gold. Killing 100 lane minions grants an additional 350 bonus gold immediately and disables Reap.

item1.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item1.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
12% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15% Life Steal for 8s (90s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item4.name: Tear of the Goddess
item4.description:
240 Mana
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to Minions.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana, up to a maximum of 360 bonus Mana. Bonus Mana doubled if the target is a champion.

    Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Lethal Tempo
perk0.shortDesc: 1.5s after damaging a champion gain a large amount of Attack Speed. Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
perk0.longDesc:
1.5s after damaging a champion gain 40 - 110% Attack Speed (based on level) for 3s. Attacking a champion extends the effect to 6s.

Cooldown: 6s

Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

item0.name: Cloak of Agility
item0.description: 15% Critical Strike Chance

item1.name: Essence Reaver
item1.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (100% base Attack Damage + 40% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage and restores 40% of this damage as Mana (1.5s cooldown).

item3.name: Rapid Firecannon
item3.description:
35% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed
  • Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Sharpshooter: Your Energized Attack applies 120 bonus magic damage. In addition, Energized attacks gain up to 35% bonus Attack Range.

    Attack Range cannot increase more than 150 units.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.3 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item0.name: Rapid Firecannon
item0.description:
35% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed
  • Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Sharpshooter: Your Energized Attack applies 120 bonus magic damage. In addition, Energized attacks gain up to 35% bonus Attack Range.

    Attack Range cannot increase more than 150 units.

item1.name: Infinity Edge
item1.description:
70 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Perfection: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain 35% Critical Strike Damage.

item2.name: Essence Reaver
item2.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (100% base Attack Damage + 40% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage and restores 40% of this damage as Mana (1.5s cooldown).

item2.name: Stormrazor
item2.description:
40 Attack Damage
15% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Paralyze: Your Energized Attack gains 120 bonus magic damage. In addition, Energized Attacks slow enemies by 75% for 0.5 seconds.

item3.name: Control Ward
item3.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item0.description:
35 Attack Damage
500 Mana
15 Ability Haste
  • Awe: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2.5% max Mana.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Attack or Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana. Bonus Mana gain doubled if the target is a champion. This item transforms into Muramana once 360 bonus Mana has been granted.

item3.name: Divine Sunderer
item3.description:
40 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 10% target max Health physical damage (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration and 5% Magic Penetration.

    Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item1.name: Galeforce
item1.description:
60 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance

Active - Cloudburst: Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination (prioritizing champions). Deals a total of (180 - 220 (based on level) + 45% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage, increased against low Health targets by up to 50% (90s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed

Maxiumum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 30%.
Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.
